title: Several T206 and a few T215 Needs for Back runs
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: Several T206 and a few T215 Needs for Back runs
posts.post_content:
If you have any of the following and would consider parting with it...
please contact me. I am a strong buyer. 

  * T206 Leifield Batting Lenox back
  * T215 Leifield Batting Red Cross Type 1 and Type 2
  * T206 Seymour Portrait Blank Back
  * T206 Chase Dark Hat Drum
  * T206 Chase Dark hat Red Hindu
  * T206 Chase Dark Hat Lenox
  * T214 Chase Dark Hat Victory
  * T206 Rhodes Portrait Drum
  * T206 Chase Trophy Brown Lenox
  * T206 Chase Trophy AB460
  * T215 Chase Trophy Red Cross Type 1 and Type 2
  * T206 Kleinow Catching Boston Lenox
Jamie is good to go! Very strong buyer, great guy.
